SEARCH
Module io.jstach.ezkv.kvs
Package io.jstach.ezkv.kvs

Interface KeyValuesServiceProvider

All Known Subinterfaces:
KeyValuesMedia, KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesFilter, KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesLoaderFinder, KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesMediaFinder
All Known Implementing Classes:
DotEnvKeyValuesMedia, JSON5KeyValuesMedia, XMLKeyValuesMedia
public sealed interface KeyValuesServiceProvider permits KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesLoaderFinder, KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesFilter, KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesMediaFinder
A service provider interface (SPI) for extending ezkv's capabilities to support additional media types and URI patterns. Implementations of this interface can be loaded using ServiceLoader.

This SPI allows customization and extension of ezkv's loading mechanisms and media type parsing.

Note: This interface is sealed, and any sub-interface implementations must be registered using provides KeyValuesServiceProvider with ... in the module-info.java or as entries in the META-INF/services/io.jstach.ezkv.kvs.KeyValuesServiceProvider file. Sub-interfaces such as KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesLoaderFinder and KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesMediaFinder should not be directly referenced in the service registration.

Example use cases include adding support for custom media types or integrating specialized URI loading logic.

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static interface 
    KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesFilter
    A service provider interface (SPI) for filtering key values after a resource is loaded.
    static interface 
    KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesLoaderFinder
    A service provider interface for finding KeyValuesLoader implementations that can handle specific KeyValuesResource instances.
    static interface 
    KeyValuesServiceProvider.KeyValuesMediaFinder
    A service provider interface for finding KeyValuesMedia implementations based on various attributes such as file extensions, media types, and URIs.
